website_summaries.verdict: The newest version of the Sophie the Giraffe teether includes multiple textures to sooth a teething baby exactly as they need it and a soft, yet sturdy construction.
pros: Adorable matching teether and socks gift set available
cons: A little smaller than the original Sophie teether

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: MADE IN CHINA This isn't a a fake product. It's sold by the original manufacturer BUT they moved production (like everyone else sadly) to China. I just wish they'd explicitly state that in the description so people don't purchase thinking it's a French product,like we did. It may still very well be natural rubber and paints etc, but we're not taking any chances with it, now that it's not Made in France Kudos to Amazon for refunding the full amount without the hassle of returning it
customer_reviews.author: Prakash K

customer_reviews.title: Ears easily chewed off.
customer_reviews.text: The giraffe was overrated in terms of utility and longevity. Moreover, the design of the object encouraged gnawing on the extremities. Thus, barely 2 months into owning Sophie, we found that my son chewed off pieces of rubber on his playpen and in his mouth. The broken pieces came off Sophie's exposed right ear and horns. The photos show the damage caused by my 10 month old son. Unfortunately, I did not return it within the 90 day time limit. Lesson learned. On the plus side, the toy is cute, easy to hold and comes in nice packaging. Unfortunately, I expected the toy to last at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: May not be authentic
customer_reviews.text: My friend bought one of these Sophie teethers from France, and my daughter loves it so much that I had to get another one to keep at daycare. The one I was gifted from France is hollow and soft. The one I received through Amazon is solid rubber, heavy, and quite hard. Despite looking real and coming in a nice package, I think it may be a knock-off. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: AMN

customer_reviews.title: Buy at a store
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter loved this teether but the material is starting to fade to a blue color underneath the yellow from sucking on the teether and that worries me I may have been sent a fake I would recommend buying at a store wish I did....
customer_reviews.author: brittany danielle redden

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Beware! this is a fake product, there's a very tiny transparent label says "made in PRC" on the side of the box, this product origin is in France, as stated in the description itself! If you compare this with an authentic Sophie giraffe, you'll find the eyes look fairly different, pls see my attached picture
customer_reviews.author: C. C

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty and not in the original box, even though it was supposed to be original and brand new
customer_reviews.text: Ok so for starters, this item was supposed to come in a nice little box, but it came in a tiny plastic bag. I didnt even have to open it to see it was dirty. The back portion had a lot of black stains. This was supposed to be an original, new product, so it's beyond me why it came in a plastic bag instead of the box and dirty. Sophie is a great product, but I wont be buying it again on Amazon since they're clearly selling used products as new
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: I've heard about Sophie for years but they were always too expensive for me to try with my kids. The pricepoint on this one as well as the handles pushed me to try it. It is my daughters FAVOURITE toy and it brings her (And my fingers) so much relief! She has cut two teeth this week so she needs all the help she can get. Try this out and see if your baby likes it. I'm planning to upgrade to a bigger size for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tae Hattery

customer_reviews.title: teething fun
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves her Sophie the Giraffe teether. It has easy grip handles and it isn't too heavy for baby to hold. My child is 3months and enjoys sucking on this. My only worry were the Giraffe ears, because she wasn't fully aware I was afraid she would poke her eye. Otherwise it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold was on it after a few months, if not for that the product is great.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when we received it in December, I ordered as a Christmas gift for my grandson. The product was easy for him to hold and place in his mouth. My daughter informed me the other day that it had mold on it. The mold was little black spots on the bottom half of it. We threw the item away. I should have saved it and contacted the company but at the time we had a lot going on and I just threw it away. If they can fix that issue the product would be great.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not as loved as the normal Sophie
customer_reviews.text: We have the normal Sophie and my son loves it. I just assumed this would be the exact same just had additional teething areas. Very wrong. This Sophie is much smaller (about the size of my hand) and very firm/dense. It is not filled with air like the normal Sophie. We haven't had it for very long but so far my son isn't really interested in it like he is the normal Sophie.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think this is fake?!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is 6 months old, she absolutely loves chewing on this and holding onto this toy. After reading some reviews and looking at Sophie’s from other sites, it appears this may be fake. I ended up returning and buying one from Nordstrom as I was too nervous this could be fake and made with a lesser quality of rubber or paint. Overall, I am not sure if this was fake or not but did not want to risk it with my baby.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Great teething toy
customer_reviews.text: I opted for this teether over the traditional Sophie because I didn't want my little guy to gag himself on Sophie's legs. I started giving this to him at 3 months. Not much interest in it except to hold in his hands. From 5 to 8 months he chewed on this teether in earnest! I could hear the squeaking of his gums on the teether from afar. It has held up really well and I just wash it in soap and warm water. Still continues to be one of his favorites. He holds onto it with both hands like a steering wheel when he falls asleep so that he has it ready for more chewing when he wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Jo L.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the original Sophie
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved the original Sophie, the larger, soft, squeaky one. When we had to throw out his first one, I found this one and liked it because it was much cheaper but still looked authentic. I honestly still don’t know if it’s a real Sophie or not. This one is about the size of my palm, hard, and not squeaky. Upon first opening I was extremely disappointed, but my baby ended up liking it anyways, which I’m thankful about.
customer_reviews.author: Pine

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Sophie teether
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this might not be a legit Sophie the giraffe teether, but I’m pleased to say it is in fact authentic. My little one is only 4 months old but can grasp this and get it in the vincinty of his mouth. He doesn’t really gum it much yet so I cannot speak to the durability. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: ERO_foto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My infant loves this teether. She got her first tooth at the end of two months old which is hard when they're just learning how to grip and pull things to their mouth this teether is perfect for tiny hands especially for infants who are just starting to grasp and pull things to their mouth. It is a great alternative to the original Sophie giraffe that's a little bit larger and is better for infants who are probably about six months and older. I have two of them. I am so happy that they make teethers that are not made of Chinese plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M

customer_reviews.title: Easier for the younger teethers to hang on to. We love our Sophie!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the larger Sophie giraffe for my older granddaughter, which was fine when she got a little older ... closer to 8-10 months and later. My youngest granddaughter has been teething since 4 1/2 months old, I decided to try this teether and am so glad I did! She is six months old now and has had a good grip on it for well over a month. Definitely better for the younger teethers.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Vanacore

customer_reviews.title: Love love love, did I say LOOOOVEEEE?
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhhhh soooophie is all I need to say for my little girl to start smiling. Honestly I don’t even care if it’s good for teething or easy to hold or anything else the smile is enough. I’m getting her 10!
customer_reviews.author: Life of Delilah Rose

customer_reviews.title: Must have :)
customer_reviews.text: We have the bigger Sofie but I guess teething is like stages where sometimes the baby wants to chew on softer or harder things so I also got this Sofie i love that it’s super easy to hold for my little one and he enjoys chewing on it for a long time. We love both of our Sofies
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: So far this is the only thing my little guy ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the only thing my little guy will chew on other than his own hand! He hates pacifiers and makes a face with all other teethers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok..
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and there is nothing wrong with it- my daughter just didn’t enjoy it. She played with it maybe 2 times and always went back to her more colorful, fun looking teethers. Maybe if I had given her this first and not the other teethers she would have received it better.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: A teething necessity
customer_reviews.text: This I bought for my grandson. He’s too young to use it right now. But its a super cute teething toy. I know he will love it. my friend bought one for her granddaughter and she always has it. it has great texture for their little gums to naw on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davis

customer_reviews.title: Can’t leave the house without it!
customer_reviews.text: We had the original Sophie, but my daughter was having trouble putting the giraffe in her mouth (4.5 months old). We ordered this one and she loves it! She’s able to control it better bc it is smaller. The two rings have different textures that she seems to enjoy when her gums are bothering her.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made falls apart
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like chemical even after being washed! The ears started coming apart thank god i notice before my daughter swallowed them!!! She is only 8 months old. Dont buy this its a hazard!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby was not having it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, sure. My baby wants nothing to do with it. I've given it awhile and she's just like...nope. so...maybe it'll work for yours. Three stars for...being what it says it is. Minus two for being a waste for me personally
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: One of his favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my son's favorite tethers and mom's too! It is easy to clean and is constructed in a way that he can't gag himself by putting it too far into his mouth. It is a must have for teething babies! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LAL

customer_reviews.title: Paint came off.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a grandchild, as I had seen so many happy children with them. My daughter tells me that it was super until the colors started flaking off. She emailed the company that makes them and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Living Up North

customer_reviews.title: Best Teether
customer_reviews.text: My babies have loved these giraffe teethers. A total must have product!! We live in Mexico, so a very hot climate, so the freezer teethers aren't a good option down here as they don't stay cold for more than just a couple of minutes. These have been the best teethers I have found!
customer_reviews.author: Bend RN

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: My baby has the original Sophie for a while. She likes it very much. I thought to buy her something new, so I brought this. It is NOT GOOD. It easier to hold because it has to rings, but it is not good for teething. I don't recommend this. Buy the original Sophie. It is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina lu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality teether
customer_reviews.text: This teether came recommended by a mommy friend! At first I was hesitant because it is a bit on the pricey side but my son is obsessed with this! He’s constantly looking for it and grabbing it to help soothe his teething! I love the natural ingredients and lack of harsh chemicals that this product stands by! I highly recommend! Also the cute giraffe is an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Suhuir Dajani

customer_reviews.title: Not easy for baby to chew on it because it has to be hold a certain way.
customer_reviews.text: Well advertised but not so great of a teether. A bit hard for my kid to figure out how to hold it as it can only be hold a certain way for the baby to bite on it. My baby have other teether like the banana teether and it is really easy to put in her mouth and she loves it. The point is anything your kid can bite on is good, no need for fancyness.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comforting
customer_reviews.text: You may wonder why this teether is almost twenty bucks. Don’t. It’s worth it. It is comforting to my little one to chew on but also to hold. I think it reminds her of holding my finger while she’s in her car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the baby loved it!!! She was OBSESSED with her socks too. They have a slight rattling noise that the baby loves in the giraffe head on the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Bunz4money

customer_reviews.title: baby loves but kind of sharp
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Sophie for teething. Good quality. The only thing that I don't like is the ears/horns are sharp and have cut her face. :( I'm hoping the more she chews on it they will dull down. if not we will be looking for something else for her.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Bacus

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what there is to love :(
customer_reviews.text: I read so many great reviews about this item that I was truly excited to get it, but once it arrived I really can't see the hype. It smells really strong, I know it is rubber but still I would expect it to smell a little less considering its a baby toy. Also the rubber attracts all kind of particles and fabrics and they get glued to the toy like a sticker. For us it has been a useless buy just sitting in a drawer
customer_reviews.author: C. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Very small, looks like the baby could chew off the ear easily. Not taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold & good for teething
customer_reviews.text: Of course we already had a regular Sophie but I wanted something firmer and smaller for her to gnaw on, and she loves it! So easy to hold and grip for her.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loved it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved this toy. Unfortunately my dog got ahold of it and chewed it to bits within a week. I decided to buy a replacement because my baby loved it so much. Alas the dog ate the replacement too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money- this works great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome teether & my baby granddaughters favorite. She can grip it easily, manipulate it to chomp with anticipated molars and seems amused by Sophie the Giraffe. Very happy with quality, safety of materials used & the design...
customer_reviews.author: Tami T.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.  Awesome
customer_reviews.text: At first i was doubtful about spending this much money on a teether, however i have no regrets after receiving it. My 4 month is a little behind in her motor skills however she can hold this teether. Easy to hold & commands her attention. Also the size is perfect for her mouth. Other teethers were too big.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGal

customer_reviews.title: Great for even the youngest teethers
customer_reviews.text: Great teething item, especially for an early teether. My son was able to handle the size and contours himself which was so important!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift for my firstborn and was not aware that this was a trendy product at the time. It was a handy little thing and my son loved teething on it and it helped with his dexterity. Fast forward to this year and wr are expecting twins so I decided to purchase another one. Originally I bought the large Sophie but I disliked it and returned it for this. I think this is a great teether!
customer_reviews.author: Content421

customer_reviews.title: Teething Babies LOVE Sophie!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 mo. old granddaughter is teething and loves this thing! It isn't just smooth, it has nubules on it to soothe tender gums. Good sturdy plastic and very easy to wash!
customer_reviews.author: Sonshine

customer_reviews.title: Great teether toy for granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: This teether Sophie is a wonderful toy for my granddaughter! She absolutely loves it! Easy to hold & soft enough to chew on!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this calm. She got her first teeth at the end of two months. Difficult when they learn how to pull things in their mouth, these nipples are especially suitable for small hands to toddlers who start pulling things out of their mouths. The original Sophie Giraffe is a little big in a great alternative alternative and is probably suitable for infants over 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: sar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for chewing babies
customer_reviews.text: Like so many babies before him, my son loves this product. We often wonder how many households know the panic of the words, "I can't find Sophie, have you seen her?!" Do be aware--my partner put her in his back pocket at one point, in a pinch to get all of us inside to where we were going. It seemed harmless at the time, but the denim of his jeans stained Sophie. Eventually the coloring faded, but she's still a little dingy looking.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: My kid was able to bite off the teether
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible.. I noticed white powder around my kid’s mouth when I took him out of the stroller and couldn’t believe it was from this teether. I feel terrible not reading the reviews about the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A Classic Winner of a Baby Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Sophie La Girafe is a great gift, a classic from a French family-run company. Very highly regarded, high quality.
customer_reviews.author: 6-StringAcoustic

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My babe is almost 4 months and exploring shoving everything in her mouth. She loves this toy. Easy to grasp and doesn't hurt when she shoves it in her face. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sophie teether!
customer_reviews.text: We're now on our 4th Sophie teether for our 4th grand baby. They're so easy for babies to hold and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: My child was able to use this one time After thoroughly cleaning the toy, it started to mold. Glad that I was able to return it without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: gmm

customer_reviews.title: Love this for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Classic baby gift. Good price. Never have had a mold problem with Sophie toys. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: goldenugget

customer_reviews.title: Very small and not interesting to a bigger baby
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard great things about the original Sophie and our son is teething but we didn't want to splurge on the $20 toy so we bought this instead. He likes it okay but it's easily discarded to chew on other things. It's very small and although easy to grab, it's not enough to hold the attention of our 8 month old. It might be a good idea for very small babies.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Z

customer_reviews.title: expensive but worth it - baby’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: It’s my baby’s favorite teething toy. She’s been using it since 5 months old (6.5 months now), and she loves it so much she’ll fall asleep holding it tight in her car seat. I don’t like to spend much money on baby toys - the babies outgrow them so fast, and besides, at this age she can look out the window for an hour and be totally stimulated and happy. This is worth it, though!
customer_reviews.author: matthew chapman

customer_reviews.title: Almost a teething essential
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it never touched the ground. Easy to clean, and great for teething.
customer_reviews.author: Daigoo

customer_reviews.title: Nahh
customer_reviews.text: Although the durability and ability to clean is good... this specific giraffe teether was MUCH smaller than expected and is not hollow, squishy, or squeaky as the the original one that I was expecting... would return if time and effect allowed being a busy parent... very unused at this point of having for at least a month now... hoping distributor will make it right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other bigger Sophie
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids have loved this version of the Sophie the giraffe compared to the other more acclaimed Sophie (bigger and with teething feet). Much easier to hold, use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Frida123

customer_reviews.title: it was her favorite toy for a long time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her first easter, she was 2 months old, and loves it. She's 10 months now, and still plays with it. We actually had to replace it after it got lost in the mall, it was her favorite toy for a long time. I really love that it's made of natural rubber and food grade paint, so I don't have to worry about my daughter being exposed to toxic chemicals. And it's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this and how easy it is to hold. He gnaws on all parts of this!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra I C Tan

customer_reviews.title: Safer alternative to original Sophie
customer_reviews.text: Great natural teething ring! I was very thrilled to see a new version of Sophie for my 5 month old. This is hands down his favorite thing to chew on! What I really like about this is that there is no choking hazard involved. My 2 1/2 year old adored the original Sophie as an infant However, her head/legs would go so far into his mouth sometimes that I was afraid he would choke! This does not squeak like big Sophie. It does bear the same natural rubber aroma. This is about half of the size as original Sophie.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jane

customer_reviews.title: We love Sophie here - and this as a great little ...
customer_reviews.text: We love Sophie here - and this as a great little stocking stuffer for my 6 month old. This one was easy to toss in the diaper bag when we were headed out the door and the handles on the sides made easy grips for him. It's all made of the same natural materials as the original Sophie, but this one is more dense and doesn't squeak (a perk when you have a dog). Fantastic little toy for little babies.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething, small, portable.
customer_reviews.text: This thing keeps my teething five month old busy for hours on end. He LOVES it. And it is so easy to clean. Small and portable I never leave home without this.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Rudman

customer_reviews.title: Good teether
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to help my 7 month old who is going through his teething phase. I wouldnt say he loves it. But he doesnt hate it either. Bites onto it for about 5 mins and gets bored. But product wise, it is of good quality. Easy to grip on. And easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Preethi Yellappa

customer_reviews.title: My baby likes it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easily clean and sterilize this giraffe compared to the bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teething Necessity!
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet: If your child is teething, you NEED this teether! Get over the price tag and buy it! (I know it's pricey, but your child will stick with this longer than other teething toys).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable. Perfect size, absolutely safe design, no any issue with the long legs like in the bigger model of the same teether. The rubber is so soft and nice in touch. My 5 month old baby girl just love to teeth it. Comfortable for her tiny hand, lightweight, perfect size for her mouth. I fixed it with the Booginhead PaciGrip Pacifier Holder, Delicate Dot Pink. It looks so girlish, just adorable. She always has it with her no matter where we are. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: balmard

customer_reviews.title: ... old but saw that this one was an Amazon Best Seller. My son loves it and chews on ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get the full sized Sophie for my teething 6-month old but saw that this one was an Amazon Best Seller. My son loves it and chews on it significantly more than any other of his other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was gifted full size Sophie La Girafe this is good for smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great teether
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for teethers. As other reviewers have mentioned, it is made in China. Oh well- we decided to go for it anyways and it seems to be just fine! Great for the price and convenience. Its especially fun for babies and he was drawn to this toy right away.
customer_reviews.author: LynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Small but great
customer_reviews.text: Just like the OG Sophie the giraffe, this one is another great teething toy! This one is much smaller than the OG, though!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Heirloom quality teether....
customer_reviews.text: Sophie is my granddaughter's favorite teething toy. Pricey, but worth it,because of the shape (grasping is easy) and textures....
customer_reviews.author: Cheezgrl

customer_reviews.title: the giraffe is adorable and the packaging is nice as well
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my cousins baby, the giraffe is adorable and the packaging is nice as well. Hopefully her baby will love it
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Good little teether
customer_reviews.text: Easy for baby to hold while chewing every inch. Paint does sort of chip/wear off. The rubber does wear down easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small (preemie) baby teething
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, my son is a preemie and started teething early so his mouth is too small for most tethers. Sophie was the right size, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Very easy for little hands to hold. It looks like a toy but it’s actually a teether. That’s probably why our first one was stolen at the zoo one day.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA J YASCOLT

customer_reviews.title: Made the switch after the mold stories hit the airwaves.
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We made the switch after reports of possible mold in the original Sophie La Girafe. It's definitely not the same but does the job, and the little still loves to chew on the face. You don't get the same natural rubber smell with this product, which is a bummer but as long as baby is happy with it so are we.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: overall good toy
customer_reviews.text: Good teething toy but i received mine in no box looking used
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Love this version of Sophie.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Sophie! Seems more hygienic and safer than the original Sophie. It is flatter and easier for our LO to handle. She LOVES it and it's great for teething. I like the fact that it is flat and washable---less chance for mold to settle in.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little one before she needed it, she would randomly chew on it every now and than (made a face the first few times, but I'm pretty sure cause it was a different feeling than she was used to. since she started chewing things more she will go grab it and chew on it. I personally like the loops since it seems to give her more things to grab onto to hold it herself, along with more area to put in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I already bought the big Sophie for my first, so when I was pregnant with my second, I bought this one so shed have a different Sophie than her older sister. It is great! It isn't as soft as the larger Sophie, but my 4 month old can hold it by herself to chew it. She has been able to hold it herself a few weeks before she could hold the larger Sophie. It it great at relieving gum discomfort. I love this teether! In fact, we lost the first one and immediately bought a second because we realized just how much we missed it.
customer_reviews.author: jlambe

customer_reviews.title: My baby really liked it
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars if not for the blue hue that shows up after baby interactions. Perhaps saliva causing reaction to material.
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: ... from a friend who said it was her daughter's favorite. It was ABSOLUTELY my son's favorite teether
customer_reviews.text: This teether was a shower gift from a friend who said it was her daughter's favorite. It was ABSOLUTELY my son's favorite teether. And I feel so good about it because it's made of natural ingredients without chemicals. I literally buy one to go with every baby shower gift I give now because it's so great.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Babies love this!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased many of these as gifts over the years- Sophie is a fan favorite!
customer_reviews.author: BMC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold!
customer_reviews.text: My little one love his teether. Very easy for him to hold compared to other tethers.
customer_reviews.author: sferrato

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it so much. Even though it was pricey, it was well worth it! And an added bonus is that it doesn't collect lint like other rubber toys.
customer_reviews.author: Be the peace you seek

customer_reviews.title: Small and not very visually appealing to baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby wasn’t crazy about this toy. It was small and just not visually appealing. She loves her actual Sophie la giraffe.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids have loved this one. Better then the big squeaky Sofie.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dickson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is by far our sons favorite teething toy. It's easy for him to hold and to manipulate and get from hand to hand. He's now 6 months old and has been using it since he was 3 months old. He can early bend it to get the perfect amount into his mouth in the perfect position. People ask us all of the time where we got it! He dropped it in Starbucks the other day and I didn't notice. Luckily a man came running out after us with it because he would have been so upset without it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Burgart

customer_reviews.title: Best Teether - Easier to Clean than the regular Sophie Giraffe
customer_reviews.text: This teether does not make the squeaking noise like the regular Vulli Sophie Giraffe but the teether ring parts are great and it is so much easier to wash than the Sophie Giraffe (which requires you to cover a hole/not get water in). This teether has no holes, so won't get/hold water in it....so much easier to wash! I love this teether and now regularly buy it to include with all baby shower gifts I give.
customer_reviews.author: Carelinie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but my son loves it!! It’s one of his favorite teething toys!
customer_reviews.author: Alyshia Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of those toys that is a MUST HAVE for teething babies! I like it better than the big Sofie for the littler babies. He can hold the handles easily and I can attach it to rings if I want to take it with us. I did put it in my mouth once to hold it and the rubber taste is not pleasant, but it has really helped my son with his teething and he doesn't seem to mind the taste. We've tried all kinds of teethers and this is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Boros

customer_reviews.title: Small and tough to chew on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. It’s actually a lot smaller than the original Sophie and tougher to chew on. I like the original much better and I think the babies too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault for not reading the full description, but I really though this was going to be bigger. I'd never seen the real Sophie in person and I didn't want to spend a ton of money on her, but now I wish I did. This mini one is cute, but it's TINY. And it's hard. And boring. I'll pretend that I like it just so I don't have to face my own disappointment every time my daughter shows zero interest in Mini Sophie.
customer_reviews.author: 805GardenQueen

customer_reviews.title: A much loved teething toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is teething and this little giraffe is his favorite for helping those teeth get through. It is easy for him to hang on to. And, it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: French 75

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a baby in my daycare and he just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sefu

customer_reviews.title: My son hasn't liked or used this at all he does however love ...
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't liked or used this at all he does however love the original Sophie La Girafe teether. This is well made but not easy for my baby to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mariangela Weiskopf

customer_reviews.title: i wanted the originally giraffe teething toy but i didn't like that it squeaked (confusing for my dogs to have ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter really loves this toy and she is 5 months old. i wanted the originally giraffe teething toy but i didn't like that it squeaked (confusing for my dogs to have a squeaking toy that isnt theirs). it is a soft rubber that she likes, she doesnt seem to enjoy the really hard plastic teething toys as much.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferri

customer_reviews.title: Great for early teethers.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for teething toys for my youngest grandson. He was teething by 3 months. He liked the toy itself, He could hold it and manipulate it into his mouth. 3 teeth later, he's still chomping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: The product was a lot smaller than I expected to be. I feel like it’s over priced. I like it but wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome teether!
customer_reviews.text: Calms down my 1 yr old who’s a bear when he’s in tether mode - godsend !!
customer_reviews.author: MamaLemon

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful teether and so much prettier than the standard plastic teethers offered. Arrives just as pictured in a very nice gift box. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: H. Jones

product_meta.title: Sophie La Girafe - So Pure Teether Giraffe
product_meta.description: Color:Sophie The GiraffeThe first teething ring made from 100 percent natural rubber. Soft model for a more advanced teething period. Ideal for soothing painful gums with natural teething ring. The two rings have different textured surfaces for baby to choose from according to his age and needs, to give even faster relief for aching gums.
feature_bullets: The first teething ring made from 100% natural rubber
Soft model for a more advanced teething period
The two rings have different textured surfaces for baby to choose from
